thread.section_title: Lowfaretravel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lowfaretravel | lowfaretravel.net
thread.title: Frank Dsouza

author: Frank Dsouza
title: Frank Dsouza
text:
I recently booked tickets for my family members through lowfaretravel and found Shiv from lowfaretravel to be very professional. Shiv was prompt in responding to my emails/phone calls and gave be good deal. I also didn't have to call airline after booking was done as Shiv followed up with me to take care of meal request and seat selection. Excellent service from Shiv.
Melwin.
